settings.editor: Teach and educate students at various levels, from primary schools to universities, in different subjects and disciplines.
Provide academic and career guidance to students, helping them make informed decisions about their educational
Offer expert advice and consultation services to schools and institutions on educational policies, practices.
Evaluate college applications, conduct interviews, and make admissions decisions to select prospective students.
Design and develop educational curricula and learning materials that align with academic standards and promote effective learning.
Teach and conduct research at the college or university level, specializing in a particular academic discipline.
